title: My Soul is in a Paper Lantern
itunes:title: My Soul is in a Paper Lantern
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
When you have no soul...

***

Content warning: child abuse

***

Written by Tobias Wade and narrated by Michelle Kane

***

To learn more about the Angel Flight Centeral visit AngelFlightCentral.org

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
